#summary Describes the extension API exposed by WebAnywhere.

= Overview of Extensions =
WebAnywhere has three types of extensions:
  * Node Spotlighters
  * Preprocessors
  * Once Per Document

= API =

= Extension development checklist =
  # Javascript file is in the Extensions directory.
  # Last line in Javascript adds the extension to the appropriate extension array. e.g., {{{WA.Extensions.nodePreprocessors.push(new WA.Extensions.IFrameNodePreprocessor());}}}
  # Add the extension to the extensions array in config.php. e.g., {{{ ,'/extensions/iframe-node-preprocessor.js' }}}
